name: alpine specter
dieMessage: an alpine @c-bold-on@@c-magenta@specter@c-reset@ emits a bone chilling shriek before fading out of existence.

attackMessages.message: The @npc-color-name@ emits a @c-cyan@chilling@c-reset@ blast of air at @player-name@!
The @npc-color-name@ summons a @c-yellow@charged@c-reset@ cloud of ions and electricity, engulfing @player-name@!
The @npc-color-name@ directs a @c-black@@c-bold-on@dark wave@c-reset@ of energy toward @player-name@!

criticalAttackMessages.message: The @npc-color-name@ raises its arms into the air, causing a dark cloud to form. As the cloud swirls, a torrent of @c-cyan@ICE CRYSTALS@c-reset@ tears into @player-name@, knocking @player-name@ to the ground and piercing their flesh!

The @npc-color-name@ murmurs a repetitive chant as it looks upward into the sky. Suddenly, the sky begins to glow a deep orange, and a cascade of @c-red@BURNING ASH@c-reset@ rains down on @player-name@, searing their flesh!

battleMessages.message: The @npc-color-name@ raises its arms and swings into the air, causing a painful wave of @c-cyan@ice@c-reset@ crystals hurtling toward @player-name@!

idleMessages.message: An @npc-color-name@ quietly coasts across the icy ground, almost as if floating.
